item.title: Platform of Top 100 Video Games Release
item.description: .container-fluid{ width:930px; max-width:1500px !important; margin-left:auto; margin-right:auto; border:1px solid #B2222200; border-radius:1px; margin-top:10px; margin-bottom:1px; font-size:100%; font-family:Helvetica, Tahoma, Arial, STXihei, "华文细黑", Heiti, "黑体", "Microsoft YaHei", "微软雅黑", SimSun, "宋体", sans-serif; } ' Platform of Top 100 Video Games Release These interactive plots show the platform of Top 100 video games release and the number of hot video games released on those platforms and you can hover your mouse over them for more details.

item.title: Genre Distribution of Top 100 Video Games
item.description: Genre Distribution of Top 100 Video Games The plots below show the number of Top 100 selling video games according to genre, and their respective shares of Top 100 total sales. item.title: Year Distribution of Top 100 Video Games
Regional Sales of Top 100 Video Games (in millions)
item.description: Regional Sales of Top 100 Video Games (in millions) The plot below shows North America, Europe, Japan and Other Sales of Top 100 Video Games in millions. This is an interactive graph, and with the tabs in the upper right corner, you are free to choose whether to see only Top 100 selling video games in a particular region or the difference in sales of video games with the same ranking in four regions at the same time.
This is worldwide summary of game sales information.
